IChing.name: The Creative
IChing.description: Heaven. The force of creativity and power.

IChing.name: The Receptive
IChing.description: Earth. The force of receptivity and yielding.

IChing.name: Difficulty at the Beginning
IChing.description: Initial difficulties are expected, but persistence will lead to success.

IChing.name: Youthful Folly
IChing.description: Inexperience and immaturity must be overcome with guidance.

IChing.name: Waiting
IChing.description: The time is not yet right. Patience will bring success.

IChing.name: Conflict
IChing.description: Opposition and struggle. Need to address conflict with care.

IChing.name: The Army
IChing.description: Discipline and organization are key. Leadership and strength are needed.

IChing.name: Holding Together
IChing.description: Unity and cooperation are essential for success.

IChing.name: Taming the Power of the Small
IChing.description: Control and moderation are necessary for growth.

IChing.name: Treading
IChing.description: Caution and careful steps are required.

IChing.name: Peace
IChing.description: Harmony and balance are achieved, leading to a prosperous situation.

IChing.name: Standstill
IChing.description: A period of stagnation or pause is necessary for change.

IChing.name: Fellowship with Men
IChing.description: Building relationships and alliances is beneficial.

IChing.name: Possession in Great Measure
IChing.description: Abundance and prosperity can be enjoyed but require responsibility.

IChing.name: Modesty
IChing.description: Humility and modesty lead to respect and success.

IChing.name: Enthusiasm
IChing.description: Energy and motivation drive progress and success.

IChing.name: Following
IChing.description: Alignment with others and accepting guidance brings positive outcomes.

IChing.name: Work on What Has Been Spoiled
IChing.description: Address and rectify past errors to create improvement.

IChing.name: Approach
IChing.description: Positive influence and approach lead to success and advancement.

IChing.name: Contemplation
IChing.description: Reflection and observation are necessary for understanding.

IChing.name: Biting Through
IChing.description: Addressing and overcoming obstacles requires determination.

IChing.name: Grace
IChing.description: Beauty and elegance in actions lead to harmony.

IChing.name: Splitting Apart
IChing.description: Challenges and separations may occur, requiring adaptation.

IChing.name: Return
IChing.description: A time of renewal and returning to basics is beneficial.

IChing.name: Innocence
IChing.description: Simplicity and sincerity lead to good fortune.

IChing.name: Taming the Great
IChing.description: Discipline and control of powerful forces are required for success.

IChing.name: Nourishment
IChing.description: Proper nourishment and care are essential for growth.

IChing.name: Greatness in Excess
IChing.description: Handling excess and challenges requires strength and balance.

IChing.name: The Abysmal
IChing.description: Facing and overcoming dangers with courage.

IChing.name: The Clinging
IChing.description: Adhering to principles and clarity brings success.

IChing.name: Influence
IChing.description: Softness and gentle influence achieve results.

IChing.name: Duration
IChing.description: Consistency and perseverance lead to lasting success.

IChing.name: Retreat
IChing.description: Withdrawing or retreating temporarily to gain advantage.

IChing.name: The Power of the Great
IChing.description: Harnessing great power with responsibility and wisdom.

IChing.name: Progress
IChing.description: Advancement and success come through diligence and effort.

IChing.name: Darkening of the Light
IChing.description: Periods of darkness and difficulty require inner strength.

IChing.name: The Family
IChing.description: Family and community support bring stability and growth.

IChing.name: Opposition
IChing.description: Differences and opposition must be managed carefully.

IChing.name: Obstruction
IChing.description: Challenges and obstacles must be overcome with perseverance.

IChing.name: Deliverance
IChing.description: Relief from difficulties and obstacles through action and persistence.

IChing.name: Decrease
IChing.description: Reduction or limitation leads to new opportunities and growth.

IChing.name: Increase
IChing.description: Growth and increase are achieved through generosity and action.

IChing.name: Breakthrough
IChing.description: Determination and strength lead to breakthroughs and overcoming obstacles.

IChing.name: Coming to Meet
IChing.description: Interactions and encounters must be approached with caution.

IChing.name: Gathering Together
IChing.description: Unity and collaboration are essential for success and achievement.

IChing.name: Pushing Upward
IChing.description: Progress and growth require effort and perseverance.

IChing.name: Oppression
IChing.description: Struggles and hardships require endurance and resilience.

IChing.name: The Well
IChing.description: Sustenance and nourishment are provided by sources of support and care.

IChing.name: Revolution
IChing.description: Change and transformation require bold actions and decisions.

IChing.name: The Cauldron
IChing.description: Transformation and refinement through processes and rituals.

IChing.name: The Arousing
IChing.description: Dynamic energy and stimulation lead to action and movement.

IChing.name: Keeping Still
IChing.description: Stability and stillness provide strength and clarity.

IChing.name: Development
IChing.description: Gradual growth and development lead to progress and success.

IChing.name: The Marrying Maiden
IChing.description: Entering into new situations or relationships requires care and respect.

IChing.name: Abundance
IChing.description: An abundant and flourishing situation results from hard work and preparation.

IChing.name: The Wanderer
IChing.description: Travel and exploration provide opportunities and experiences.

IChing.name: The Gentle
IChing.description: Gentle and gradual influence leads to positive change.

IChing.name: The Joyous
IChing.description: Joy and pleasure bring positive outcomes and relationships.

IChing.name: Dispersion
IChing.description: Scattering and dispersing lead to new opportunities and beginnings.

IChing.name: Limitation
IChing.description: Constraints and limitations bring about new directions and insights.

IChing.name: Inner Truth
IChing.description: Self-awareness and inner truth guide actions and decisions.

IChing.name: Preponderance of the Small
IChing.description: Small and careful steps lead to significant results and changes.

IChing.name: After Completion
IChing.description: Completion leads to new beginnings and opportunities.

IChing.name: Before Completion
IChing.description: Preparation and patience lead to successful completion and achievement.
